about_the_game:
Craft Slices

Cosmo's Pizzarama is a dungeon-crawling RPG set in space. Collect pizza toppings, from pepperoni to anchovy, to add to your pizza blaster. Each topping adds a unique modifier to your attack--from fiery pepper blasts to bouncy escargot slices. Pair up to six toppings on a pizza pie to build the ultimate attack.

Uncover A Galactic Conspiracy

Along the way, you'll uncover a galactic conspiracy. Hordes of corrupted enemies stand in your path, and they're not going to back down without a fight. Luckily for you, someone... or something wants you to fight back. Enlist the help of a god-like race of aliens to build up your Cosmic power. Use this newfound power to unlock new abilities like teleportation and healing. You're definitely gonna need it...
